programme.title: Bebeklerin Gelişimi
programme.desc: En son uzman çekim tekniklerini kullanarak, bir bebeğin doğal gelişimi açığa çıkıyor. Doğduğu andan başlayarak yuruduğu aşamaya kadar buyume ve gelişmeleri takip ediliyor.

programme.title: DIY Sci Clips: How to Control a Pendulum with Your Mind
programme.desc: From walking on eggs to turning soda bottles into rockets: DIY SCI features jaw-dropping science experiments viewers can do at home.

programme.title: Bilimi Kendin Yap: Amerika Guzeli
programme.desc: 2020nin Amerika Guzeli Camille Schrier, Bilimi Kendin Yapı arkadaşı Steve Spanglerla birlikte sunuyor. Aldığı biyomikmya eğitimiyle, 2020 Amerika Guzeli, bize dev bir kopuklu Fil Diş Macununu nasıl yapacağımızı gosterip, bir sınıfa bilim projelerinde yardımcı oluyor

programme.title: Futuris: Çevre Dostu Plastikler
programme.desc: Yenilikçi nanoteknolojinin kullanımı ile, araştırmacılar doğada yok olabilen torbalar ve konteynırlar uretiyorlar. Bu bolumde doğada yok olabilen urunlerin test edildiği İspanyadaki Zaragozaya gidiyoruz.

programme.title: Futuris: Hayal Edilemeyeni Gormek
programme.desc: Bilgisayar Muhendisleri savaş sonrası yok olan Bergen-Belsen esir kampını dijital olarak inşa etmek için sanal ve arttırılmış gerçeklik kullanıyorlar. Bu bolumde, ilerlemeyi gozlerimizle gormek için Barselonadaki arttırılmış gerçeklik laboratuarına yolculuk ediyoruz.

programme.title: Bilimi Kendin Yap: Franklin Enstitusu 1
programme.desc: Steve Spangler, Philadelphia, Pennsylvaniadaki Franklin Enstitusunu ziyaret ediyor. Steve, Ben Franklinin efsanevi "Şimşek Fırtınasında Uçurtma" sunumunu tekrar canlandırarak, size elektriği kontrol etme gucu verecek, evde yapabileceğiniz deneyleri gosteriyor.

programme.title: Futuris: Benim Robotum, Benim Arkadaşım
programme.desc: Casperla tanışın: yuruyen, konuşan ve oyun oynayabilen, genç kanser hastaları için tasarlanmış bir robot. Acaba Casper pozitif enerji yaratabilecek mi? Yaratabilirse bu pozitif enerji hastaların yorucu tedavilerini daha hızlı atlatabilmelerini sağlayabilecek mi?

programme.title: Futuris: Daha Kaliteli Ekmek Yapmak
programme.desc: Acaba soğuk su sisi ekmeğin tadını ve yapısını arttırabilir mi? Almanya Bremerhavende ultrason teknolojisi baz alınarak hazırlanan yeni fırınlama teknikleri uzerine çalışan gıda teknologları ile buluştuk.

programme.title: Bear Gryllsın Sunduğu Olağanustu Olmak: Yıldız (Julia Roberts) ve Dovuşçu (Wladimir Klitschko)
programme.desc: Bear Gryllsin sunduğu Olağanustu Olmakın bu bolumunde, Julia Roberts, Oscar odullu bir aktris olma yolculuğunu yeniden yaşıyor ve Wladimir Klitschko nasıl Olimpiyat altın madalyası sahibi ve rekor kıran dunya ağır sıklet boks şampiyonu olduğunu paylaşıyor.

programme.title: Futuris: Gençliğin Sırrı
programme.desc: Deniz omurgasızları, anti-aging gibi kozmetik amaçlar için değerli sayılacak biyoaktif molekuller taşırlar. Bu bolumde, Akdeniz- İspanya kıyılarına numuneler için dalış yapan bir grup araştırmacıya katılacağız.

programme.title: Futuris: Deniz bilimine Yeni Bir Bakış
programme.desc: Avrupa tarımındaki rekabeti arttırmak için, araştırmacılar aynı anda farklı turler yetiştiriyorlar. Bunun sonucu olarak, omurgasızlar yada bitkiler diğer turlerin kulturunden kaybettikleri besinleri geri donuşturebilecekler.

programme.title: Bear Gryllsın Sunduğu Olağanustu Olmak: Kaleci (Maddie Hinch) ve Kâşif (Ranulph Fiennes)
programme.desc: Bear Gryllsin sunduğu Olağanustu Olmakın bu bolumunde, dunyanın en iyi çim hokeyi kalecisi ve Olimpiyat altın madalyası sahibi Maddie Hinch ve dunyanın yaşayan en buyuk kaşifi Ranulph Fiennes, rekor kıran yolculuklarını paylaşıyor.

programme.title: Futuris: Manevi Kulturel Mirası Kurtarmak
programme.desc: Kulturel miras, mimari ve eşyanın çok daha otesidir: aynı zamanda muzik, dans, şan, tiyatro, ve el işçiliği gibi kırılgan soyut canlı dışavurumları da içerir. Peki bunları nasıl doğru, interaktif ve masrafsız bir şekilde koruyabiliriz?

programme.title: Futuris: Kutup Araştırmaları Artıyor
programme.desc: Neden kutup bolgeleri Avrupa ulkeleri için bu kadar onemli? Ve nasıl oluyor da AB uyesi ulkeleri araştırmalarını bu kadar sert çevresel şartlara rağmen iyi koordine edebiliyor? EU-PolarNET projesi bilimadamları bu sorunun cevabını arıyor.

programme.title: Bebeklerin Gelişimi
programme.desc: En son uzman çekim tekniklerini kullanarak, bir bebeğin doğal gelişimi açığa çıkıyor. Doğduğu andan başlayarak yuruduğu aşamaya kadar buyume ve gelişmeleri takip ediliyor.

programme.title: Futuris: Global Gozlem
programme.desc: Bol ve yetiştirmesi kolay olan mikroalgler, surdurulebilir besin ve gıda olmayan urunler için umut veren bir besleme stoğu olma yolunda. Bu bolumde mevcut teknolojilere goz atmak için İspanya, Portekiz ve Holandaya gidiyoruz.

programme.title: Keşfetmeye Ne Dersin?: Filika ve Beton
programme.desc: Maddie, bir filikanın denizde başı belada olan insanları nasıl bulabileceğini oğreniyor ve beton yapılırken çakıl, kum, çimento ve suyun nasıl karıştırıldığını gormek için bir taş ocağını ziyaret ediyor, ve betonun yola nasıl dokulduğunu gosteriyor.

programme.title: Keşfetmeye Ne Dersin?: Uçak ve Pilot Eğitimi
programme.desc: Maddie, uçakların nasıl kalktığını gormek için bir havaalanına gidiyor ve bir pilotun kokpitteki kontrolleri nasıl kullandığını oğreniyor. Ayrıca eğitim araçlarının yapıldığı bir fabrikayı ziyaret ederek, robotik makinelerin nasıl yuksek hızda çalıştığını goruyor.

programme.title: Keşfetmeye Ne Dersin?: Trafik Işıkları ve Acil Durum Işığı
programme.desc: Maddie, araçların kavşaklardan guvenli bir şekilde geçebilmesini sağlayan trafik ışıklarının nasıl çalıştığını gosteriyor. Ayrıca polis arabaları için acil durum ışıklarının nasıl yapıldığını oğrenmek için bir fabrikayı ziyaret ediyor ve ışığın ilk testini gosteriyor.

programme.title: Keşfetmeye Ne Dersin?: Tıraş Makinesi ve Bale Ayakkabıları
programme.desc: Maddie, tıraş makinelerinin nasıl çalıştığını gormek için berbere gidiyor ve bale ayakkabıları yapımında saten, kurdele gibi malzemelerin ve farklı kesicilerin, dikiş makinelerinin ve çekiçlerin nasıl kullanıldığını oğreniyor.

programme.title: Keşfetmeye Ne Dersin?: Çocuk Parkı ve Saksılar
programme.desc: Maddie oyun parkında, salıncak ve kaydırakların nasıl çalıştığını ve yer çekiminin kaydırak kullanmamızı nasıl sağladığını oğreniyor. Sonra, taş ocağından çıkan malzemelerin nasıl karıştırılıp, şekillendirilip pişirildiğini gormek için bir saksı fabrikasına gidiyor.

programme.title: Keşfetmeye Ne Dersin?: Disko Topu ve Yapboz
programme.desc: Maddie, disko toplarının nasıl çalıştığını gostermek için dans pistine gidiyor. Topun uzerindeki minik aynaların ışığı bir odanın etrafına nasıl yansıttığını goruyoruz. Sonra, yapboz yapılırken, elektrikli testereyle ahşap kesimini gormek için bir fabrikaya gidiyor.

programme.title: Keşfetmeye Ne Dersin?: Mektup Postalamak ve Renkli Kalemler
programme.desc: Maddie, bir mektubun posta sistemindeki yolculuğunu takip ederek bize gosteriyor. Ayrıca renkli kalemlerin nasıl yapıldığını oğrenmek için bir fabrikaya giderek, içindeki renkli mum boyanın nasıl kilden yapıldığını ve şaftın tahtadan yapıldığını goruyor.

programme.title: Keşfetmeye Ne Dersin?: Baloncuklar ve Çikolata
programme.desc: Maddie, baloncuk karışımına uflediğimizde baloncukların nasıl çıktığını gosteriyor. Ayrıca bir çikolata fabrikasına giderek, çikolatanın aslında bir meyve olduğunu oğreniyor. Daha sonra robotların çikolata kutularını nasıl bir araya getirdiğini goruyor.

programme.title: Harika Gezegen: Spor ve Çevre
programme.desc: Sporun ve çevremizin kesiştiği noktadayız. Dağlarımızı korumayı amaçlayan Olimpik bir snowboardcuyla tanışıyoruz. Ardından profesyonel bir sorfçunun çocuklara okyanuslarımızı ve plajlarımızı temiz tutmanın onemini oğrettiği Hawaiiye gidiyoruz.

programme.title: Yenilik

programme.title: Yenilik: Smart Irrigation Bears Fruit

programme.title: Harika Gezegen: Kaşif Öğrenci
programme.desc: Bu bolumde, ikinci KaşifÖğrenci Yarışmamızın kazananını açıklıyoruz. Philippe ve şanslı oğrenci daha sonra yunuslar, dalışlar ve bir mercan resifi restorasyon projesinde yer almak için Fijiye gidiyor.

programme.title: Yenilik: The Future Is: Hands-free Driving

programme.title: Harika Gezegen: Öncu Öğrenciler
programme.desc: Bu bolumde dunyayı değiştirmek isteyen oğrencilerden bir şeyler oğreniyoruz. Çocuklara iklim değişikliğini yaratıcı bir şekilde oğreten bir oğrenci de dahil olmak uzere en buyuk zorluklarımızdan bazılarına çozumler sunan oğrencilerle tanışıyoruz.

programme.title: Harika Gezegen: Tehlike Altındaki Yerler
programme.desc: Bu bolumde, deniz seviyesindeki yukselmenin bariyer adalar uzerindeki etkilerinden, kalkınma tehdidi altındaki bir milyon donumluk bozulmamış araziyi gormeye kadar tehdit altındaki yerlerin birkaç orneğini ziyaret ediyoruz.

programme.title: Yenilik
programme.desc: Avrupalı bilim insanları ve girişimciler tarafından geliştirilen muthiş heyecan verici urunlere goz atın. Enerji tasarruflu lambadan laboratuvarda uretilen kalp kapakçığına, su altı yolculuğundan uzaktan kumandalı robot itfaiyeciye, her şey var.

programme.title: Yenilik: A Robot In Mind
programme.desc: Avrupalı bilim insanları ve girişimciler tarafından geliştirilen muthiş heyecan verici urunlere goz atın. Enerji tasarruflu lambadan laboratuvarda uretilen kalp kapakçığına, su altı yolculuğundan uzaktan kumandalı robot itfaiyeciye, her şey var.

programme.title: İcatlar Dunyası: Renk Korluğunu Duzeltme
programme.desc: Alie Ward, renk korlerinin renkleri gormesini sağlayan gozlukleri ve genç mucitlerin Akıllı Direksiyonlarıyla suruşu daha guvenli hale getirmesini anlatıyor. 3 boyutlu giysi baskısını araştırıyor ve yeni bir iletişim yolu icat eden bir film aktrisini keşfediyor.

programme.title: Futuris: Aluminyum Atıkları
programme.desc: Bilim insanları, aluminyum uretiminden çıkan bir atık olan "Kırmızı Çamur"u, briket ve yer karosu gibi inşaat malzemelerinde kullanılacak bir tur cama donuşturmeye çalışıyorlar.

programme.title: Futuris: İletişimli Robotlar
programme.desc: Robot Mario muzik ve basit etkileşimler kullanarak , demans hastaları iletişim kurmak için geliştiriliyor. Beyni muzik ve basit etkileşimlerle canlandırarak yalnızlığı ve soyutlanmış hissini azaltıyor.

programme.title: İcatlar Dunyası: Filmlerde Hayvan Sihri
programme.desc: Alie Ward, vahşi hayvanları filme almanın yeni bir yolunu gosteriyor ve elektrikli bir scooter deniyor. Bebekleri guvende tutmak için tasarlanmış teknolojiyi keşfediyor ve yarının mucitleriyle buluşuyor.

programme.title: Futuris: Hibrit Araçlar
programme.desc: Avrupa ECOCHAMPS birliği, enerji tasarrufu ve uretim maliyetini azaltmak amacıyla hibrit araçlar geliştiriyor. Bu yeni otomobiller ve ticari araçlar, suruş durumuna bağlı olarak hibritten tam elektrikli moda geçiş yapabiliyorlar.

programme.title: Futuris: Butanol
programme.desc: Araştırmacılar, bio dizel veya etanol gibi mevcut yakıtlara gore daha dayanıklı ve daha ucuz bir alternatif olan butanol yapmak için saman kullanıyorlar. Sonuçta çıkan yakıt, oranla dizele ve %16 oranla benzine karıştırılabiliyor.

programme.title: Keşfetmeye Ne Dersin?: Bulaşık Makinesi ve Masa
programme.desc: Maddie, bulaşık makinesinin kirli bulaşıkları nasıl temizlediğini oğreniyor. Daha sonra, ahşabın geldiği yeri ve ağaçların nasıl kesildiğini gormek için surdurulebilir bir ormana gidiyor, ve ahşabın nasıl masaya donuştuğunu gormek için bir mobilya atolyesine gidiyor.

programme.title: Keşfetmeye Ne Dersin?: Yumurta ve Ekmek
programme.desc: Maddie, yumurtaların nereden geldiğini gormek için bir çiftliğe gidiyor ve yumurtaların piştiğinde neden renk değiştirdiğini oğreniyor. Ayrıca buğday tanelerinin nasıl una donuşturulduğunu gormek için bir değirmene gidip, ekmeğin nasıl yapıldığını da oğreniyor.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: DW News is news and information channel from a German international broadcaster Deutsche Well (German Wall). It provides latest news from Europe and all around the world in several languages on a daily basis. DW news is informative, entertaining, up-to-date and what is more important, reliable source of news.

programme.title: The Day
programme.desc: The news as it happened, presented, clarified and analysed by experts and specialists. Studio-based and in-the field summaries and analysis of the events to have marked the previous twenty-four hours enable understanding and place within a wider context the issues that have shaped, focused and given direction over the course of the previous day.

programme.title: Arts Unveiled: Experiencing and understanding the art world
programme.desc: In this episode 3 of our series, we visit the vibrant capital of Ethiopia. Photographer Nafkot Gebeyehu guides us through Addis Ababa, where a new generation of artists explore tradition, innovation, and a lively nightlife.

programme.desc: Gun içinde yaşanan gelişmeler, gundemde yer alan konular izleyicilere aktarılıyor. Siyasetten ekonomiye, kulturden sanata Turkiye ve dunya gundemine ilişkin onemli gelişmeler ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Karademlik
programme.desc: Ülkemizin doğal zenginlikleri ve keşfedilmemiş guzellikleri Karademlikte ekrana geliyor. Gorsel zenginliği ile on plana çıkan Karademlik, doğayı seven herkese hitap eden bir program...

programme.title: Aile Deyince
programme.desc: Aile Deyince, beş çocuklu Duzgun ailesinin, birbirleriyle ve komşularıyla yaşadıkları komik ve yer yer duygusal olaylar konu alınıyor.

programme.title: Dini Gundem
programme.desc: Toplumda polemik yaratan, halkın kafasını karıştıran, bilgi kirliliğine sebep olan durumlar her yerde. Yanlış anlaşılması muhtemel, açıklanmasını istediğiniz konular her an karşımızda...Hayatımızda birden bire ortaya çıkan ve karşılığını bulamadığımız sorunlar var.Peki, doğruyu nasıl bulacağız? Kafa karışıklığı nasıl son bulacak? Dini Gundem ile tum sorularınız cevap buluyor. Diyanet İşleri Başkanlığı Din İşleri Yuksek Kurulu uye ve uzmanları ile merak ettiğiniz her konuya, Kur’an, sunnet ve sahih İslam geleneğinin rehberliğinde açıklık getiriyoruz.

programme.title: Riyazus Salihin Okumaları
programme.desc: Prof. Dr. Halil İbrahim Kutlayın anlatımı ile İmam Nevevi tarafından kaleme alınan Riyâzus Sâlihîn eserinin okumaları yapılıyor.

programme.title: Kuran Öğreniyorum
programme.desc: Her şey Okuyla başladı... Çunku kainatın sırrı Kuranın hakikatinde saklıydı. İşte bu yuzden insan Kuranı oğrenmek istedi.

programme.title: Tesbihat
programme.desc: O halde onların soylediklerine sabret ve guneşin doğuşundan once de, batışından once de Rabbini hamd ederek tesbih et

programme.title: Esma-i Husna
programme.desc: Esma-i Husna programı Allahın guzel isimlerini ekrana taşıyor. Allahın guzel isimlerinin anlamlarını ve derinliğini sizlerle paylaşıyor.

programme.title: Mukabele
programme.desc: Kuran-ı Kerimden her gun bir cuzun okunduğu programda, her ay Kuran-ı Kerimin tamamı hatmediliyor. Mukabele, izleyicilere Kuran-ı Kerimi okumayı ve anlamayı oğretiyor.

programme.title: Diyanete Soralım
programme.desc: Aklınıza takılan soruları her bolumde işin uzmanına soruyoruz.

programme.title: Neşeli Dostlar Sokağı
programme.desc: Elif ve Mimle değerler, Ebabille Elifba eğitimi veren program tum çocukları ekrana davet ediyor.

programme.title: Korkusuz Leventler
programme.desc: Kemal Reis, hem zulumden kaçan Enduluslu Muslumanlara yardım etmek, hem de Endulus kutuphanelerinde bulunan birbirinden değerli kitapları kurtarmak için gemisiyle yola çıkar. Ancak, Kemal Reisin gemisinde surpriz iki yolcu da bulunmaktadır: Piri ve Gul.

programme.title: Masal Sandığı
programme.desc: Annesini kuçuk yaşta kaybeden, babasının işi dolayısıyla da surekli şehir değiştiren 11 yaşındaki Selçukun dedesinin evindeki Masal Sandığını keşfetmesi hayatını değiştirecektir.

programme.title: Birlikte Yapalım
programme.desc: Yarışmacı çocuklar, ikili grup şeklinde pratik kolay yemekler yapıyor ve dekorun çeşitli yerlerine saklanan soruları cevaplıyor.

programme.title: Babamın Kitaplığı
programme.desc: Turkiyenin ilmi, edebi ve sosyo kulturel hayatında etkili olmuş, medeniyet tarihimize yon vermiş, hayatı, eserleri, ve duruşuyla ornek olmuş duşunurlerin yaşam oykusune yer veriliyor. Onların yaşamına bire bir şahit olan, aynı zamanda ilmi kimliğiyle tanınmış çocuklarının dilinden yazma seruvenleri Babamın Kitaplığında ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Aile Zamanı
programme.desc: Aile ve dini rehberlik burolarına gelen sorular dini, sahih ve guvenilir bilgiler ışığında cevaplanıyor. Gundelik pratikler uzerinden hayat tecrubeleri de paylaşılıyor.Sunumunu Betul Erbaş’ın yaptığı programda sizlerden gelen sorulara hem saha tecrubesi hem ilmi birikimi ile Zehra Tuncel Hoca cevap veriyor.

programme.title: Yunus Emre Aşkın Yolculuğu
programme.desc: Yunus, Konyanın meşhur medreselerinde, onemli muderrislerin eğitiminden alarak Sivrihisar kazasında kadılık yapmaktadır. İlmiye sınıfı mensubu bir medreseli olan Yunusun ana meselesi, Moğol baskısıyla bozulan liyakat duzenidir. Yunus yaşadığı olaylar vesilesi ile Tapduk Emre ile karşılaşır. Bu karşılaşma hem kendisini hem de yetiştiği ilmiye sınıfını ve bilgi kaynaklarını sorgulamasına vesile olur.Yaşadığı bu çetin muhasebesin sonunda Yunus’un yolu Tapduk Emre dergâhına varacak ve Yunus Tapduk Emre’ye intisap edip, onun muridi olacaktır. Kadılık cubbesini çıkaran Yunus; dervişlik hırkasını giyecektir.

programme.title: Namaz Ve Hayat
programme.desc: Hayat; kimini zor şartlarla sınar. Kimini zamanla yarıştırır.Ve bu hayatta asıl kazananlar; zamana kapılmadan, şartlara esir olmadan vaktin peşinde olanlardır.

programme.title: Kuran Öğreniyorum
programme.desc: Her şey Okuyla başladı... Çunku kainatın sırrı Kuranın hakikatinde saklıydı. İşte bu yuzden insan Kuranı oğrenmek istedi.

programme.title: Sorun Değil
programme.desc: Çocukların ve gençlerin zihinlerini kurcalayan, psikolojilerini ve davranışlarını etkileyen esasında sorun gibi gorunen meselelerin sorun olmadığı anlatılıyor.

programme.title: Mukabele
programme.desc: Kuran-ı Kerimden her gun bir cuzun okunduğu programda, her ay Kuran-ı Kerimin tamamı hatmediliyor. Mukabele, izleyicilere Kuran-ı Kerimi okumayı ve anlamayı oğretiyor.

programme.title: Şaheserler
programme.desc: İslam alimlerinin duşunce tarihinde iz bırakan şaheserleri konu alınıyor.

programme.title: Riyazus Salihin Okumaları
programme.desc: Prof. Dr. Halil İbrahim Kutlayın anlatımı ile İmam Nevevi tarafından kaleme alınan Riyâzus Sâlihîn eserinin okumaları yapılıyor.

programme.title: Çocuğuz Kuran Okuyoruz
programme.desc: Bu programda çocuklarımız yeni ve ozgun bir yontemle, Ses Temelli Elifba Yontemi ile Kuran okumayı oğreniyorlar. Programa katılan 12 oğrenci de çekimler esnasında toplam 12 gunde oğreniyorlar Kuran okumayı. Bolum bolum oğrencilerin gosterdiği gelişme izleyiciler tarafından da takip edilebiliyor.

programme.title: Bil Bakalım
programme.desc: Hem bilgilendiren hem eğlendiren hem gezdiren yarışma programı Bil Bakalım, Mehmet Zeyd Yıldız’ın sunumuyla ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Diyanet Ana Haber
programme.desc: Gun içinde yaşanan gelişmeler, gundemde yer alan konular izleyicilere aktarılıyor. Siyasetten ekonomiye, kulturden sanata Turkiye ve dunya gundemine ilişkin onemli gelişmeler ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Yaz Defteri
programme.desc: Eşya bize ne soyler?Harf neden harf, yazı neden yazıdır?Sıradan gorduğumuz şeyler hangi derinlikleri saklar?Mehmet Aycı ve Emin Gurdamur, entelektuel bir bakışla, yaz defterinin sayfalarına kultur hayatımıza dair farklı, ilginç ve zengin dipnotlar duşuyor.

programme.title: Sozden Öte
programme.desc: Geçmişten gunumuze gelen Turk-İslam muzik enstrumanlarının yapımı ve tarihsel sureci anlatılıyor.

programme.title: Din ve Psikoloji
programme.desc: Dinin insan hayatındaki etki ve boyutlarının konuşulduğu, insanın iç dunyasına doğru bir yuruyuşun gerçekleştirildiği program, uzman konuklar eşliğinde ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Vefa Sokak
programme.desc: Samimi sevgilerin, yardımlaşma ve vefanın one çıktığı Vefa Sokakta, sokak sakinlerinin birbirleri ile bazen komik bazen huzunlu ilişkileri anlatılıyor.

programme.title: Bestehan
programme.desc: Klasik musikimizin en guzel yorumları, birbirinden değerli konukların katılımı ve Mehmet Kemiksiz’in sunumu ile ekranlara geliyor.

programme.title: Yolcu
programme.desc: Şehirler arası bir otobuste yolculuk eden, birbirini tanımayan yolcuların ibret verici hikayeleri Yolcu ile ekranlara geliyor.

programme.desc: Hz. Peygamberin (sav) Kuranın kalbi olarak nitelendirdiği Yasin Sûresi okunuyor.

programme.title: Hurda Bizim İşimiz
programme.desc: Ekip Missouride, Branson kentindeki Silver Dollar Cityde bulunan Geyser Gulcha geri doner. Bu kez, bazı onemli parçalar bir kuş evi, aşırı buyuk tavalar ve su tabancalarıdır.

programme.title: Hurda Bizim İşimiz
programme.desc: Ekip, Ohioda, Wellsvilledeki bir evin işini ustlenir. Kurtardıkları onemli parçalar, rengarenk pencereleri, destek parçalarını ve veranda sutunlarını içerir.

programme.title: Unutulmuş Hazineler: Klasik Arabalar
programme.desc: Henry ve Fuzz, şahane Amerikan arabalarıyla dolu bir garajı ziyaret eder. İkili, biraz kâr elde edebilecek guvenilir bir klasik seçmeye karar verir.

programme.title: Nasıl Yapılmış?
programme.desc: LED aydınlatma tuplerinin , fındık ezmeli çikolataların ve Medikal Robotların nasıl uretildiğini oğreniyoruz.

programme.title: Nasıl Yapılmış?
programme.desc: Gunluk sıradan eşyaların nasıl yapıldığı mercek altına alınıyor. Bu bolumun konuları: Ticari İnsansız Uçaklar, Akvaryum Balıkları, Uçak Pisti Temizleyicileri, Badminton Topları.

programme.title: Nasıl Yapılmış?
programme.desc: Havanlar, Bowling Şeridi Duzenleyicileri, Krematoryumlar ve Tahtadan Oyuncak Setleri nasıl uretilir oğreniyoruz.

programme.title: Kırsalın Ustaları
programme.desc: Ekip bir ahşap kulubeyi restore ederken Mark Bowe, Alabamada buyuleyici bir kır duğunu evini ve doşeme tahtalarından mobilya yapan bir ustayı ziyaret ediyor.

programme.title: Tamirat Tadilat

programme.title: Tamirat Tadilat Dunya Turu
programme.desc: Mike ve Elvis iddialı McLaren P1 projesi için bir YouTube içerik ureticisine tavsiye verir. Dunyanın en hızlı McLarenının inşa edilmesine yardım edebilecekler mi?.

programme.title: Çelik Kardeşliği
programme.desc: Michael Manousakis ve Morlock Motors garajındaki ekibi her aracı elde edebilir. Westerwaldlı dahimiz dunyanın her yerinde muthiş projeler gerçekleştirmiş bir usta.

programme.title: Gizli Suları Keşfet
programme.desc: Maceracılar Meksikada deniz aslanlarıyla, şnorkelle yuzer, Guamdaki bir ormanda bir şelaleye doğru yurur, North Carolinada hızlı bir doğal su kaydırağı ziyaret eder.

programme.title: Hoffman Altınları
programme.desc: Kış bastırırken, Hoffmanlar toprak donmadan once madeni çıkarmak için çabalar. Madencilik imkânsız hale gelmeden hedeflerine ulaşabilecekler mi?.

programme.title: Avustralyalı Hurda Avcıları

programme.title: Elf World

As with many of the Duck TV productions, there is also an educational purpose to this bright and engaging cartoon. This will enhance your childs creativity and encourage them to think creatively, while keeping them entertained throughout.

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Learn how important water is to life on earth. This informative animation is something adults and children can enjoy together, while learning about animal habits and their habitats. Making the world of water come to life, help your child recognise and name animals to increase cognitive processes and strengthen memory. Submerge yourself in a world of fish and dont miss out.

programme.title: Mini Fairy Tales
programme.desc: Join the princess, the dragon, the fairies and the elves on their adventures in this mini-series of all your favourite fairy-tales. programme.title: Puffy and Tubby
programme.desc: Join best friends Puffy and Tubby, a couple of guinea pigs who are always hungry, as they embark on journeys around their environment in the search for more and more food. With a focus on developing social skills, identifying new objects and introducing your little ones to various new adventures, Puffy and Tubby excels at combining developmental lessons with endless fun.

programme.title: Vege-tales
programme.desc: In Veggie-tales, childrens animated series, talking fruit and vegetable perform theatrical productions based on very kind stories. Main characters Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber with the help of other vegetables are telling stories and teaching kids the basic human values, like honesty, thankfulness, kindness.

programme.title: In the Museum
programme.desc: In a big museum full of beautiful art something peculiar keeps happening. Every now and then an animal disappears from the paintings. Can you help Mr.Clown as he journeys around the museum in search of his missing friends? In a great introduction to different types of art, In the Museum helps to reinforce shape recognition and improve young viewers ability to recognise and identify different animals.

programme.title: Safari
programme.desc: Children can learn about the various wild and not-so wild animals from this well beautifully illustrated safari related programme. It goes on to explore each animals habitats within the environment it lives in but also studies their behaviour. This will provide children with a real insight into animals they already know and some that they may not and include facts that are not always provided.

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid the development of young children.

programme.title: Colorwheel
programme.desc: One brave little pup is determined to find his friend, who is lost in the forest. He uses his trusty colour wheel to navigate his way, using skills of reasoning and logic. This programme is a Duck TV production, that intends to educate its audience, alongside entertaining them. In this series, children will develop skills such as problem solving, decision making, and also knowledge around colour.

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

Dance is an excellent way to develop young viewers musical skills, the sense of rhythm and even their listening skills, setting them up for a bright future. And lets be honest, everyone loves to have a good dance.

programme.title: Vege-tales
programme.desc: In Veggie-tales, childrens animated series, talking fruit and vegetable perform theatrical productions based on very kind stories. Main characters Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber with the help of other vegetables are telling stories and teaching kids the basic human values, like honesty, thankfulness, kindness.

programme.title: Ding Dang Dong
programme.desc: Children are encouraged to join in with a range of different dances, building on their coordination and motor skills in the process. This is a Duck TV production. Duck TV seeks to create content that is both engaging and fun, but also educational. This makes learning new things fun and easy!

programme.title: Sport, Sport, Sport
programme.desc: Learning about sports has never been more fun! This exciting animated show teaches us all about different kinds of exercises, physical activity and sports, promoting the benefits of being healthy and encouraging its young viewers to expand their hobbies by exploring new sports. For the littlest viewers, this sport-tastic show promotes motor skills and movement, increasing muscle strength and balance!

programme.title: Dance
programme.desc: Come and join the dance party! Get up and get moving with these three adorable characters as they dance around the screen to different songs and tunes. Dance is an excellent way to develop young viewers musical skills, the sense of rhythm and even their listening skills, setting them up for a bright future. And lets be honest, everyone loves to have a good dance.

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Learn how important water is to life on earth. This informative animation is something adults and children can enjoy together, while learning about animal habits and their habitats. Making the world of water come to life, help your child recognise and name animals to increase cognitive processes and strengthen memory. Submerge yourself in a world of fish and dont miss out.

programme.title: Colorwheel
programme.desc: One brave little pup is determined to find his friend, who is lost in the forest. He uses his trusty colour wheel to navigate his way, using skills of reasoning and logic. This programme is a Duck TV production, that intends to educate its audience, alongside entertaining them. In this series, children will develop skills such as problem solving, decision making, and also knowledge around colour.

programme.title: Sunville
programme.desc: Follow the lives of the animal families of Sunville in these playful silent animated shorts. Encourage your child to join in with the narration of the stories to help them learn new words, identify objects and sounds, and develop their early social skills. Creatively develop your childs imagination as you discover what an average day looks like in their friendly little village.

programme.title: Holiday
programme.desc: Join the children as the enjoy their holiday visiting the lake in these silent animated shorts. Follow them as they go on exciting adventures together, exploring the lake and having fun on its sandy shorelines. Learn about the different everyday objects and colours while introducing your children to new multi-sensory activities.

programme.title: Color Magic
programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. Let your imagination run wild with this simple but fun colouring show whilst also developing your basic visual skills, stimulating colour and shape recognition and identification.

programme.title: Panni and Fanni
programme.desc: Panni and Fanni the two fairies draw their own versions of a sample picture to help toddlers to develop skills such as associating objects with their shapes and colours and stimulating imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Miyu and Litto
programme.desc: Miyu and Litto want you to come on their latest adventure! This is a Duck TV production, designed to both entertain and educate young children. Problem solving and decision making are key to the success of their adventures, along with their trusty colour wheel, too. Will you be able to apply skills of logic and reasoning to help Miyu and Litto in their adventures?

programme.title: In the Museum
programme.desc: In a big museum full of beautiful art something peculiar keeps happening. Every now and then an animal disappears from the paintings. Can you help Mr.Clown as he journeys around the museum in search of his missing friends? In a great introduction to different types of art, In the Museum helps to reinforce shape recognition and improve young viewers ability to recognise and identify different animals.

programme.title: Enlightment Corner
programme.desc: This show makes learning fun! As with the majority of Duck TVs productions, this cartoon offers both educational and entertainment benefits. Your little ones will no doubt love following these fun little stories, and will also learn to identify everyday objects along the way, and understand their uses, too. This is essential to their development, and will also help them to gain new skills.

programme.title: Listen to This
programme.desc: This fun and colourful cartoon will keep your kids entertained, and also teach them a couple of creative skills on the way, through encouraging young children to pair sounds to animals and musical instruments. The programme will introduce key musical instruments, and improve sound recognition. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid child development.

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This enchanting display is accompanied by soothing music. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

programme.title: Puffy and Tubby
programme.desc: Join best friends Puffy and Tubby, a couple of guinea pigs who are always hungry, as they embark on journeys around their environment in the search for more and more food. With a focus on developing social skills, identifying new objects and introducing your little ones to various new adventures, Puffy and Tubby excels at combining developmental lessons with endless fun.

programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

programme.title: Sippi Sappi
programme.desc: Sippi Sappi is an educational show about a couple of friends who love rollerskating around whilst on holiday in the countryside. The programme aims to encourage its young viewers to engage in sporting activites, encourage creative thinking and relate to other childrens adventures. Aired on Duck TV Sippi Sappi is an all round fun way to get your little ones active and excited about sport.

programme.title: Shaping Up
programme.desc: Join Shaping Up as the happy and smiling geometric shapes introduce shapes to younger audiences and combine to create various objects that children will recognise from their everyday world. Developing babies proper shape-recognition from using vibrant colours a smooth transitions, Shaping Up combines educative aspects so that babies are able to develop their image recognition and creative skills.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

programme.title: Raul
programme.desc: Raul and Birdie are best friends. Raul is an adorable green hippopotamus who loves to go on exciting adventures and Birdie is his side kick. These two lovable characters find themselves in all sort of situations as they journey around the countryside, but with each others help they will always find their way out of any problem.

programme.title: Didy Baby
programme.desc: Go on an adventure with a group of adorable baby animals in Didy Baby. The show teaches its tiny viewers social skills, and introduces them to problem solving and decision making.

programme.title: Hubbi and Friends
programme.desc: Hubbi and Friends are a group of handymen that embark on a series of exciting adventures on their travels through the countryside. They use their passion for fixing to fix everything that they find, even if it doesnt need fixing. The show teaches the incredibly important lesson that its okay to make mistakes, which promotes healthy interactions between parents and children.

programme.title: Ducky Adventures
programme.desc: Every day is a different adventure for Ducky! This animated show lets toddlers and pre-schoolers to join Ducky to learn through daily activities. This series is brought to you by DuckTV, which works with child psychologists in creating programmes for babies and toddlers. Ducky Adventures has been designed to help your child develop their observational skills whilst also letting them use their imagination and creativity.

programme.title: The World of Animals
programme.desc: This childrens cartoon is both educational and entertaining. Children will develop their knowledge on animals, so that they cannot only name animals, but they have a basic understanding of how and where they might live. Children can then apply this knowledge to their everyday lives, either in zoos, or even parks. As a result, children have greater respect for and interest in the environment.

programme.title: Partners in Fun
programme.desc: Go on countless adventures and mess around with this adorable duo. Join a baby monkey and bear-cub as they play around, making friends and having fun. Young viewers can develop their social skills and learn about the value of friendship whilst experiencing lots of different adventures. Get your little one to interact with the show by identifying colours as they come onto the screen for extra learning.

programme.title: Sea Adventure
programme.desc: Gentle animation set to music. Sea Adventure follows the lives of two lively little fish who are growing up in their natural environment. This show can be used to help teach toddlers new vocabulary.

programme.title: India
programme.desc: Want an adventure? Join an Indian boy and his elephant as they travel and explore their own country, visiting the market place and meeting new people! Designed for young audiences to experience various adventures, vibrant colours, smooth animation and music aids children to develop their thinking and observational skills, as well as stimulating their senses!

programme.title: Mini Fairy Tales
programme.desc: Join the princess, the dragon, the fairies and the elves on their adventures in this mini-series of all your favourite fairy-tales. Designed with education and creativity, Mini Fairy Tales ensures to bring your childs imagination to life, encouraging parents to get involved and participate in telling stories your young ones! Come on an adventure and join in with the fairy-tale!

programme.title: Happy Meadow
programme.desc: Two happy rabbits, Sari and Nati have lots of fun playing in Happy Meadow, in this childrens cartoon. They have plenty of other lovable friends who also live in Happy Meadow with them. Duck TV aim to produce content for young children that is educating, and aids their development, while being entertaining at the same time. Children are encouraged to grow their vocabulary and recognise colours.

programme.title: Hop-hop
programme.desc: Hop-hop is a cartoon for the littlest viewers of 6 to 36 months old and their families. Its engaging and educational content together with peaceful music and colorful catching picture is very entertaining. Cute Bunnies do everything together- play, eat, brush their teeth, walk, run, swim, have fun.

programme.title: Hubbi and Friends

The show teaches the incredibly important lesson that its okay to make mistakes, which promotes healthy interactions between parents and children.

programme.title: Ducky and Friends
programme.desc: Childrens programme that follows the amazing adventures of a lovable little duck named Ducky, and a variety of her friends. By watching their escapades, young viewers will have lots of fun, and they will also have a chance to learn about friendship, sharing, and playing nicely with friends.

programme.title: Connected World
programme.desc: Join the children in this friendly multicultural day-care centre and learn about the diverse heritages of each of the toddlers. Learn where each of the pupils are from and even try to guess their nationalities from their clothing, favourite landmarks and special foods. Help them to narrate the stories and encourage them to be curious about new cultures, languages and countries.

programme.title: Fireteam
programme.desc: Hop on board the bright red fire truck and follow the three little firemen as they get to work keeping their village safe. These silent animated shorts are perfect for educating your child on the importance of safety and the role of the emergency services. Encourage your child to develop their ability to problem solve and improve their decision-making skills by identifying hazards and solutions together.

programme.title: We Are Playing Now
programme.desc: Educational childrens magazine exploring the world around us, including familiar people and objects through drawing and painting. It helps children develop cognitive skills, as well as parent-child emotional relations, introducing them to different situations.

programme.title: Mini Fairy Tales
programme.desc: Join the princess, the dragon, the fairies and the elves on their adventures in this mini-series of all your favourite fairy-tales. Come on an adventure and join in with the fairy-tale!

programme.title: Bathroom
programme.desc: Join the little yellow duckling and her big elephant friend as they have endless fun splashing around in the Bathroom. Aimed at the littlest of viewers, this show includes the classic educational values of Duck TV, helping the development of motor skills and sensory activity. But most importantly, Bathroom helps it little viewers to befriend bath time, showing them how much fun a bath can be!

programme.title: Beaver Family
programme.desc: This cartoon is designed for very young children. It shows the relationships of a beaver family, and how they go about their everyday lives. programme.title: Tempo Giusto
programme.desc: Learning about time can be hard, but Tempo Giusto makes it so much fun. Go on an adventure with Henry and Lola as they introduce you to the basics concepts of time, help you develop your pre-math skills and teach you about the sequencing of events. Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. Through this show, it will teach your child about developing social skills, teach them the values of friendship and join Mimo and Bobo on their adventures and experience them together! Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.desc: Join elf twins Liza and Ben to learn more about sounds, how to find them and how to recreate them. Lola is a playful young girl who helps us to identify different numbers, count from one to ten and develop our pre-math skills. The most important viewing tips for parents and little ones is that we always count with Lola! whether its in English or your own language, counting aling is always fun!

programme.title: Shaping Up
programme.desc: Join Shaping Up as the happy and smiling geometric shapes introduce shapes to younger audiences and combine to create various objects that children will recognise from their everyday world. Developing babies proper shape-recognition from using vibrant colours a smooth transitions, Shaping Up combines educative aspects so that babies are able to develop their image recognition and creative skills.

programme.title: Fireteam
programme.desc: Hop on board the bright red fire truck and follow the three little firemen as they get to work keeping their village safe. These silent animated shorts are perfect for educating your child on the importance of safety and the role of the emergency services. Encourage your child to develop their ability to problem solve and improve their decision-making skills by identifying hazards and solutions together.

programme.title: Henrys Stories
programme.desc: Henry loves telling stories, but he needs your help to make sure its all in the correct order. Follow Henry in these silent animated shorts as he constructs stories with the help of his handy picture cards. Teach your children about logical thinking and deductive reasoning as you narrate the sequences together and solve his picture puzzles to see the story come to life.

programme.title: Doll Team
programme.desc: This cartoon is both incredibly entertaining, and educational. In accompanying these three friends, your child will learn social skills, and friendship. The trio that will take you on this journey are Bell, the sweetest flower-doll, Lilo, the cuddly teddy bear, and Fido, the incredibly playful kangaroo. The three friends are determined to help the inhabitants of the undergrowth however they can.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. Through this show, it will teach your child about developing social skills, teach them the values of friendship and join Mimo and Bobo on their adventures and experience them together! Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Tempo Giusto
programme.desc: Learning about time can be hard, but Tempo Giusto makes it so much fun. Go on an adventure with Henry and Lola as they introduce you to the basics concepts of time, help you develop your pre-math skills and teach you about the sequencing of events. Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

programme.title: Fireteam
programme.desc: Hop on board the bright red fire truck and follow the three little firemen as they get to work keeping their village safe. These silent animated shorts are perfect for educating your child on the importance of safety and the role of the emergency services. Encourage your child to develop their ability to problem solve and improve their decision-making skills by identifying hazards and solutions together.

programme.title: Mimos World
programme.desc: Join some of our favourite Duck TV characters as they embark on lots of new adventures. Our little panda bear Mimo and his best friend Bobo from "Didy Baby" and "Mimo and Bobo" journey around Mimos world meeting new friends and having fun. This exciting new show puts a massive emphasis on the importance of friendship and teaches us all about different friendship values.

programme.title: Ducky Adventures
programme.desc: Every day is a different adventure for Ducky! This animated show lets toddlers and pre-schoolers to join Ducky to learn through daily activities. This series is brought to you by DuckTV, which works with child psychologists in creating programmes for babies and toddlers. Ducky Adventures has been designed to help your child develop their observational skills whilst also letting them use their imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Lola and the Numbers
programme.desc: Lola and the Numbers makes counting fun for its littlest viewers. Lola is a playful young girl who helps us to identify different numbers, count from one to ten and develop our pre-math skills. The most important viewing tips for parents and little ones is that we always count with Lola! whether its in English or your own language, counting aling is always fun!

programme.title: Hipp-hopp Cactus
programme.desc: Join three houseplants and a busy little bee as they learn more about the objects, shapes and colours they find around their home. Once theyre sure no one is around, the trio of plants come to life and identify where to find them and how to use them properly. Learn up to 20 new words a day as your child has fun labelling the objects they see while searching for them in your own home.

programme.title: Fireteam
programme.desc: Hop on board the bright red fire truck and follow the three little firemen as they get to work keeping their village safe. Encourage your child to develop their ability to problem solve and improve their decision-making skills by identifying hazards and solutions together.

programme.title: Finn and Fianna
programme.desc: Finn and Fianna, the two little elves, are studying their environment and discovering their environment with a lot of curiousity! Getting to know their surroundings and the basic attributes that exist within it, join Finn and Fianna as they use their senses of seeing, tasting, feeling and discovering to develop your little ones thinking skills as well as what they see!

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.desc: Childrens programme that follows the amazing adventures of a lovable little duck named Ducky, and a variety of her friends. By watching their escapades, young viewers will have lots of fun, and they will also have a chance to learn about friendship, sharing, and playing nicely with friends.

programme.title: Nature Dudes
programme.desc: Nature Dudes is a fun cartoon that helps its young viewers to learn about all things natural. programme.title: Ristorante
programme.desc: Welcome to the Ristorante, come in and find out how the restaurant works. Learn about all the different processes starting with the preparation and moving to the baking or the cooking, the serving and finally to the dish washing. Encourage your little ones to play pretend, cooking up some imaginary treats for you, your friends and family. Learn some new vocabulary, stimulate your senses and having fun.

programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty

Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.title: Didy Baby

programme.title: Nature Dudes
programme.desc: Nature Dudes is a fun cartoon that helps its young viewers to learn about all things natural. They focus on teaching about identifying different animals, learning about their different habits and habitats. They also put a focus on seasons and the weather, helping its little viewers learn about rain and sunshine, in a fun and exciting way.

programme.title: Small - But Hardworking

It advances childrens imagination, by stimulating their senses with a bright colourful cartoon. Objects coming to life also enhances the focus on promoting creative imagination. This programme also aids children in beginning to recognise shapes.

programme.title: Sounds Around Us
programme.desc: Join elf twins Liza and Ben to learn more about sounds, how to find them and how to recreate them. Follow them as they whizz away on exciting adventures together to investigate where different familiar sounds are coming from. Play along with the twins and encourage your child to listen and identify the sounds you hear together. Can you work out the source before the twins do?

programme.title: Lola and the Numbers
programme.desc: Lola and the Numbers makes counting fun for its littlest viewers. Lola is a playful young girl who helps us to identify different numbers, count from one to ten and develop our pre-math skills. The most important viewing tips for parents and little ones is that we always count with Lola! whether its in English or your own language, counting aling is always fun!

programme.title: Train

programme.title: Ducky Adventures

programme.title: Cucu, Im here!

Cucu, Im here! is the perfect way to have some fun whilst learning something new.

programme.title: Shaping Up
programme.desc: Join Shaping Up as the happy and smiling geometric shapes introduce shapes to younger audiences and combine to create various objects that children will recognise from their everyday world. programme.title: Higher the Better

programme.title: Zoo
programme.desc: One friendly zoo keeper wants you to come along and meet all the exciting animals hes looking after, and learn a few things on the way, too! programme.title: Tempo Giusto
programme.desc: Learning about time can be hard, but Tempo Giusto makes it so much fun. Go on an adventure with Henry and Lola as they introduce you to the basics concepts of time, help you develop your pre-math skills and teach you about the sequencing of events. Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

programme.title: Hop-hop
programme.desc: Hop-hop is a cartoon for the littlest viewers of 6 to 36 months old and their families. programme.title: Fireteam
programme.desc: Hop on board the bright red fire truck and follow the three little firemen as they get to work keeping their village safe. programme.title: Toby McFly
programme.desc: This imaginative and creative childrens animation follows the adventures of Toby McFly, a canine aviator who presents us with a birds eye view of the world. The show is educational, stimulating, and informative as well as being fun and entertaining.

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. programme.title: Monica and Rudy
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy is a colorful animated series on Duck TV intended for the youngest viewers. Monica is a little girl who has a pet- a parrot named Rudy. Monica takes Rudy out of the cage and together they go on their little adventures- in the forest, in the park, or to the pond where they meet different animals and birds. Monica teaches Rudy to imitate the sounds made by the animals.

programme.title: Sounds Around Us
programme.desc: Join elf twins Liza and Ben to learn more about sounds, how to find them and how to recreate them. Follow them as they whizz away on exciting adventures together to investigate where different familiar sounds are coming from. Play along with the twins and encourage your child to listen and identify the sounds you hear together. Can you work out the source before the twins do?

programme.title: ABC - duckBC
programme.desc: Writing skills introduced, explained and developed through the animated adventures of the five stalwarts of the art of penmanship: Pen, Pencil, Stamp, Eraser and Brush. From A to Z, the five friends take children through the steps to produce beautiful letters and write wonderful words.

programme.title: Zack and Ziggy
programme.desc: Meet a little geek boy named Zack and his best friend, a dog named Ziggy as they help children learn the concept of size through funny adventures, laughter and games. Join them as they make size based line ups, groups, and comparisons, having lots of fun along the way.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. When watching this series, parents are advised to talk about the jobs that are being shown so that they are able to learn why people do the profession that they do. Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

programme.title: Panni and Fanni
programme.desc: Panni and Fanni the two fairies draw their own versions of a sample picture to help toddlers to develop skills such as associating objects with their shapes and colours and stimulating imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Colorwheel
programme.desc: One brave little pup is determined to find his friend, who is lost in the forest. He uses his trusty colour wheel to navigate his way, using skills of reasoning and logic. This programme is a Duck TV production, that intends to educate its audience, alongside entertaining them. In this series, children will develop skills such as problem solving, decision making, and also knowledge around colour.

programme.title: Miyu and Litto
programme.desc: Miyu and Litto want you to come on their latest adventure! This is a Duck TV production, designed to both entertain and educate young children. Problem solving and decision making are key to the success of their adventures, along with their trusty colour wheel, too. Will you be able to apply skills of logic and reasoning to help Miyu and Litto in their adventures?

programme.title: Panni and Fanni
programme.desc: Panni and Fanni the two fairies draw their own versions of a sample picture to help toddlers to develop skills such as associating objects with their shapes and colours and stimulating imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Lola and the Numbers
programme.desc: Lola and the Numbers makes counting fun for its littlest viewers. Lola is a playful young girl who helps us to identify different numbers, count from one to ten and develop our pre-math skills. The most important viewing tips for parents and little ones is that we always count with Lola! whether its in English or your own language, counting aling is always fun!

programme.title: Ducky Adventures
programme.desc: Every day is a different adventure for Ducky! This animated show lets toddlers and pre-schoolers to join Ducky to learn through daily activities. This series is brought to you by DuckTV, which works with child psychologists in creating programmes for babies and toddlers. Ducky Adventures has been designed to help your child develop their observational skills whilst also letting them use their imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Monica and Rudy
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy is a colorful animated series on Duck TV intended for the youngest viewers. Monica is a little girl who has a pet- a parrot named Rudy. Monica takes Rudy out of the cage and together they go on their little adventures- in the forest, in the park, or to the pond where they meet different animals and birds. Monica teaches Rudy to imitate the sounds made by the animals.

programme.title: Henrys Stories
programme.desc: Henry loves telling stories, but he needs your help to make sure its all in the correct order. Follow Henry in these silent animated shorts as he constructs stories with the help of his handy picture cards. Teach your children about logical thinking and deductive reasoning as you narrate the sequences together and solve his picture puzzles to see the story come to life.

programme.title: Color Clara
programme.desc: Clara is an extraordinary, extra colourful, chameleon girl. Deep in the jungle in her cosy chameleon house, Clara uses her colour changing powers for good by helping her wrongly coloured jungles friends and objects to return to their natural colour. This exciting jungle tale helps young viewers to connect objects to their usual colours, developing their basic visual skills..

programme.title: Shaping Up
programme.desc: Join Shaping Up as the happy and smiling geometric shapes introduce shapes to younger audiences and combine to create various objects that children will recognise from their everyday world. Developing babies proper shape-recognition from using vibrant colours a smooth transitions, Shaping Up combines educative aspects so that babies are able to develop their image recognition and creative skills.

programme.title: Listen to This
programme.desc: This fun and colourful cartoon will keep your kids entertained, and also teach them a couple of creative skills on the way, through encouraging young children to pair sounds to animals and musical instruments. The programme will introduce key musical instruments, and improve sound recognition. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid child development.

programme.title: Color Magic
programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. programme.title: Toby McFly
programme.desc: This imaginative and creative childrens animation follows the adventures of Toby McFly, a canine aviator who presents us with a birds eye view of the world. After flying over many fascinating landscapes, active animals, busy people, and interesting places, Toby lands his aircraft and shows us, in detail, what we have just seen from above. The show is educational, stimulating, and informative as well as being fun and entertaining.

programme.title: Finn and Fianna
programme.desc: Finn and Fianna, the two little elves, are studying their environment and discovering their environment with a lot of curiousity! Getting to know their surroundings and the basic attributes that exist within it, join Finn and Fianna as they use their senses of seeing, tasting, feeling and discovering to develop your little ones thinking skills as well as what they see!

programme.title: Hop-hop
programme.desc: Hop-hop is a cartoon for the littlest viewers of 6 to 36 months old and their families. Its engaging and educational content together with peaceful music and colorful catching picture is very entertaining. Cute Bunnies do everything together- play, eat, brush their teeth, walk, run, swim, have fun.

programme.title: Fireteam in Action
programme.desc: Fireteam in Action on Duck TV is an animated series revolving around great adventures of firemen. Kids find out about their significant work and learn the importance of helping each other in difficult situations. The series and its sweet characters teach the little viewers to give a helping hand and be responsible.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

programme.title: Ducky and Fluffy
programme.desc: The Ducky family has a brand new member! With the arrival of her little brother Fluffy, Ducky experiences a wide range of new emotions and finds herself in new situations. Stories are created with the support of child psychologists to help children adjust to the arrival of a new sibling.

programme.title: Planet Jumpers
programme.desc: Planet Jumpers is a series set in the future, in space. Through the everyday life of the siblings Luna and Lou we get to know different planets, funky futuristic objects and places while developing the socialization skills of our preschooler viewers.

programme.title: Happy Meadow
programme.desc: Two happy rabbits, Sari and Nati have lots of fun playing in Happy Meadow, in this childrens cartoon. They have plenty of other lovable friends who also live in Happy Meadow with them. Duck TV aim to produce content for young children that is educating, and aids their development, while being entertaining at the same time. Children are encouraged to grow their vocabulary and recognise colours.

programme.title: Mimos World
programme.desc: Join some of our favourite Duck TV characters as they embark on lots of new adventures. Our little panda bear Mimo and his best friend Bobo from "Didy Baby" and "Mimo and Bobo" journey around Mimos world meeting new friends and having fun. This exciting new show puts a massive emphasis on the importance of friendship and teaches us all about different friendship values.

programme.title: Doll Team
programme.desc: This cartoon is both incredibly entertaining, and educational. In accompanying these three friends, your child will learn social skills, and friendship. The trio that will take you on this journey are Bell, the sweetest flower-doll, Lilo, the cuddly teddy bear, and Fido, the incredibly playful kangaroo. The three friends are determined to help the inhabitants of the undergrowth however they can.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

programme.title: Ristorante
programme.desc: Welcome to the Ristorante, come in and find out how the restaurant works. Learn about all the different processes starting with the preparation and moving to the baking or the cooking, the serving and finally to the dish washing. Encourage your little ones to play pretend, cooking up some imaginary treats for you, your friends and family. Learn some new vocabulary, stimulate your senses and having fun.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. programme.title: Doll Team to the Rescue
programme.desc: Bell and her trusty friends Fido the Kangaroo and Lilo the Bear come to the rescue in the forest for anybody that needs it! Doll Team to the Rescue teaches the importance of social skills, friendship and treating animals with love and respect.

programme.title: Zoo
programme.desc: One friendly zoo keeper wants you to come along and meet all the exciting animals hes looking after, and learn a few things on the way, too! This cartoon for young children, encourages them to recognise and name a variety of animals, acquire basic vocabulary, and associate the sounds animals with the sounds that they make.

programme.title: Hipp-hopp Cactus
programme.desc: Join three houseplants and a busy little bee as they learn more about the objects, shapes and colours they find around their home. Once theyre sure no one is around, the trio of plants come to life and identify where to find them and how to use them properly. Learn up to 20 new words a day as your child has fun labelling the objects they see while searching for them in your own home.

programme.title: Small - But Hardworking
programme.desc: Three elves build a variety of different objects with materials such as wood and ice. This show is designed to be both educational and entertaining. It advances childrens imagination, by stimulating their senses with a bright colourful cartoon. Objects coming to life also enhances the focus on promoting creative imagination. This programme also aids children in beginning to recognise shapes.

programme.title: Sunville - Sportsville
programme.desc: Mister Goat, the Raccoon Family, Kitty Cat and the Friendly Pig are participating in Sports Day, and they want you to come along and join the fun! In doing so, not only will your child have lots of fun, but they will be exercising and developing basic coordination skills along the way. They will also increase muscle strength and sense of balance, which will keep them healthy and happy!

programme.desc: Join the painter bear as he draws and paints friends for himself to play with. What are his painted friends today? The series is a perfect bedtime story to relax before going to bed. The bear helps to encourage imagination and develop basic visual and motor skills. A whole family can paint together for the perfect bonding activity of parents and children.

programme.title: Train
programme.desc: Join the friendly train conductor and adorable cartoon train as they go on magical journeys and gentle adventures, making sure all of their passengers get taken to the right place at the right time. The short stories are designed to teach your little ones about grouping and categories, using colour, shape, size and purpose to demonstrate this logical task.

Once theyre sure no one is around, the trio of plants come to life and identify where to find them and how to use them properly. Learn up to 20 new words a day as your child has fun labelling the objects they see while searching for them in your own home.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. Through this show, it will teach your child about developing social skills, teach them the values of friendship and join Mimo and Bobo on their adventures and experience them together! Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Finn and Fianna
programme.desc: Finn and Fianna, the two little elves, are studying their environment and discovering their environment with a lot of curiousity! Getting to know their surroundings and the basic attributes that exist within it, join Finn and Fianna as they use their senses of seeing, tasting, feeling and discovering to develop your little ones thinking skills as well as what they see!

programme.title: Mimos World
programme.desc: Join some of our favourite Duck TV characters as they embark on lots of new adventures. Our little panda bear Mimo and his best friend Bobo from "Didy Baby" and "Mimo and Bobo" journey around Mimos world meeting new friends and having fun. This exciting new show puts a massive emphasis on the importance of friendship and teaches us all about different friendship values.

programme.title: Higher the Better
programme.desc: Come along with Kiteko the goofy giraffe and Umi the playful meerkat in Higher the Better as they watch the everyday life of toddlers and begin to learn about their everyday adventures! Travelling on field trips and making lots of fun when theyre playing, Higher the Better develops childrens social skills, encourages them to observe and think deeper about what they are watching on their screen.

programme.title: Hipp-hopp Cactus
programme.desc: Join three houseplants and a busy little bee as they learn more about the objects, shapes and colours they find around their home. Once theyre sure no one is around, the trio of plants come to life and identify where to find them and how to use them properly. Learn up to 20 new words a day as your child has fun labelling the objects they see while searching for them in your own home.

programme.title: Raul
programme.desc: Raul and Birdie are best friends. Raul is an adorable green hippopotamus who loves to go on exciting adventures and Birdie is his side kick. These two lovable characters find themselves in all sort of situations as they journey around the countryside, but with each others help they will always find their way out of any problem.

programme.title: Color Clara
programme.desc: Clara is an extraordinary, extra colourful, chameleon girl. Deep in the jungle in her cosy chameleon house, Clara uses her colour changing powers for good by helping her wrongly coloured jungles friends and objects to return to their natural colour. This exciting jungle tale helps young viewers to connect objects to their usual colours, developing their basic visual skills..

programme.title: Ducky Adventures
programme.desc: Every day is a different adventure for Ducky! This animated show lets toddlers and pre-schoolers to join Ducky to learn through daily activities. This series is brought to you by DuckTV, which works with child psychologists in creating programmes for babies and toddlers. Ducky Adventures has been designed to help your child develop their observational skills whilst also letting them use their imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Doll Team
programme.desc: This cartoon is both incredibly entertaining, and educational. In accompanying these three friends, your child will learn social skills, and friendship. The trio that will take you on this journey are Bell, the sweetest flower-doll, Lilo, the cuddly teddy bear, and Fido, the incredibly playful kangaroo. The three friends are determined to help the inhabitants of the undergrowth however they can.

programme.title: Ristorante
programme.desc: Welcome to the Ristorante, come in and find out how the restaurant works. Learn about all the different processes starting with the preparation and moving to the baking or the cooking, the serving and finally to the dish washing. Encourage your little ones to play pretend, cooking up some imaginary treats for you, your friends and family. Learn some new vocabulary, stimulate your senses and having fun.

programme.title: DuckSchool

There might even be some special guests to meet along the way.

This cartoon is not only incredibly entertaining, but it promotes problem-solving, and encourages observational and cognitive skills within young children.

programme.desc: Henry loves telling stories, but he needs your help to make sure its all in the correct order. Follow Henry in these silent animated shorts as he constructs stories with the help of his handy picture cards. Teach your children about logical thinking and deductive reasoning as you narrate the sequences together and solve his picture puzzles to see the story come to life.

programme.title: Sounds Around Us
programme.desc: Join elf twins Liza and Ben to learn more about sounds, how to find them and how to recreate them. Follow them as they whizz away on exciting adventures together to investigate where different familiar sounds are coming from. Play along with the twins and encourage your child to listen and identify the sounds you hear together. Can you work out the source before the twins do?

programme.title: Zack and Ziggy
programme.desc: Meet a little geek boy named Zack and his best friend, a dog named Ziggy as they help children learn the concept of size through funny adventures, laughter and games. Join them as they make size based line ups, groups, and comparisons, having lots of fun along the way.

programme.title: Hop-hop
programme.desc: Hop-hop is a cartoon for the littlest viewers of 6 to 36 months old and their families. Its engaging and educational content together with peaceful music and colorful catching picture is very entertaining. Cute Bunnies do everything together- play, eat, brush their teeth, walk, run, swim, have fun.

programme.title: Sippi Sappi
programme.desc: Sippi Sappi is an educational show about a couple of friends who love rollerskating around whilst on holiday in the countryside. The programme aims to encourage its young viewers to engage in sporting activites, encourage creative thinking and relate to other childrens adventures. Aired on Duck TV Sippi Sappi is an all round fun way to get your little ones active and excited about sport.

programme.title: Nature Dudes
programme.desc: Nature Dudes is a fun cartoon that helps its young viewers to learn about all things natural. They focus on teaching about identifying different animals, learning about their different habits and habitats. They also put a focus on seasons and the weather, helping its little viewers learn about rain and sunshine, in a fun and exciting way.

programme.title: Ducky Adventures
programme.desc: Every day is a different adventure for Ducky! This animated show lets toddlers and pre-schoolers to join Ducky to learn through daily activities. This series is brought to you by DuckTV, which works with child psychologists in creating programmes for babies and toddlers. Ducky Adventures has been designed to help your child develop their observational skills whilst also letting them use their imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Ristorante
programme.desc: Welcome to the Ristorante, come in and find out how the restaurant works. Learn about all the different processes starting with the preparation and moving to the baking or the cooking, the serving and finally to the dish washing. Encourage your little ones to play pretend, cooking up some imaginary treats for you, your friends and family. Learn some new vocabulary, stimulate your senses and having fun.

programme.title: Lola and the Numbers
programme.desc: Lola and the Numbers makes counting fun for its littlest viewers. Lola is a playful young girl who helps us to identify different numbers, count from one to ten and develop our pre-math skills. The most important viewing tips for parents and little ones is that we always count with Lola! whether its in English or your own language, counting aling is always fun!

programme.title: Toby McFly
programme.desc: This imaginative and creative childrens animation follows the adventures of Toby McFly, a canine aviator who presents us with a birds eye view of the world. After flying over many fascinating landscapes, active animals, busy people, and interesting places, Toby lands his aircraft and shows us, in detail, what we have just seen from above. The show is educational, stimulating, and informative as well as being fun and entertaining.

programme.title: Small - But Hardworking
programme.desc: Three elves build a variety of different objects with materials such as wood and ice. This show is designed to be both educational and entertaining. This programme also aids children in beginning to recognise shapes.

programme.title: Train
programme.desc: Join the friendly train conductor and adorable cartoon train as they go on magical journeys and gentle adventures, making sure all of their passengers get taken to the right place at the right time. programme.title: Cucu, Im here!
programme.desc: Have some fun with the Cucus as they play hide and seek. Cucu, Im here! follows the cucus as they go on lots of adventures, playing games and laughing all day! Cucu, Im here! is the perfect way to have some fun whilst learning something new.

programme.desc: Educational childrens magazine exploring the world around us, including familiar people and objects through drawing and painting. It helps children develop cognitive skills, as well as parent-child emotional relations, introducing them to different situations.

programme.title: Holiday
programme.desc: Join the children as the enjoy their holiday visiting the lake in these silent animated shorts. Follow them as they go on exciting adventures together, exploring the lake and having fun on its sandy shorelines.
